server:
  listen: 443
  server_name: example.com
  ssl: true
  ssl_certificate: /etc/ssl/certs/example.crt
  ssl_certificate_key: /etc/ssl/private/example.key
  
locations:
  - path: /
    proxy_pass: http://backend:3000
  - path: /api
    proxy_pass: http://api:8080
    proxy_set_header:
      Host: $host
      X-Real-IP: $remote_addr
